views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

"This goes out to you" -Biggie Smalls // Kick in the Door

On iOS 10 only, BiggieSmallcc makes album art in the control center bigger relative to your screen size, and also pushes the sliders & transport controls down a bit to make use of wasted screenspace.

It's a touch bigger but still feels quite comfortable compared to the small sized defaults, I personally am quite pleased with the results

Compatible with most other music tweaks such as Acapella III. Respring is not needed to enable/disable.

Please considermy work if you hope to see more features/updates, hope you enjoy!

Configure options from Settings.

2.0 -> 2.1

fixed not-playing compact look
general fixes
further cleaned up compact look


2.0 update

Improved the look of Big Compact art , it looks amazing on all screensizes and works with & without Horseshoe, please try it out again :)



0.1.1 -> 0.1

-new toggle for cutting of the album title in tiny view, a surprisingly cool feature which I'm sure many will enjoy as it also removes a lot of the ugliness from 3rd party apps & their naming schemes
